menuitem.description: View all libraries and lists in this site.

a.title: Settings
a.span: Use SHIFT+ENTER to open the menu (new window).

div.span: To navigate through the Ribbon, use standard browser navigation keys. To skip between groups, use Ctrl+LEFT or Ctrl+RIGHT. To jump to the first Ribbon tab use Ctrl+[. To jump to the last selected command use Ctrl+]. To activate a command, use Enter.

a.title: Browse
a.onkeydown: if(event != null && event.keyCode == 13){ if(typeof(_ribbon) != 'undefined') _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = true; _ribbonStartInit('Ribbon.Read',false, event); }

a.title: Page
a.onkeydown: if(event != null && event.keyCode == 13){ if(typeof(_ribbon) != 'undefined') _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = true; _ribbonStartInit('Ribbon.WikiPageTab',false, event); }

a.title: Publish
a.onkeydown: if(event != null && event.keyCode == 13){ if(typeof(_ribbon) != 'undefined') _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = true; _ribbonStartInit('Ribbon.PublishTab',false, event); }

td.div: Distance Learning Plan for Ogilvie Public Schools, March 31st - May 1st.

div.div: javascript:commonShowModalDialog('{SiteUrl}'+ '/_layouts/15/itemexpiration.aspx' +'?ID={ItemId}&List={ListId}', 'center:1;dialogHeight:500px;dialogWidth:500px;resizable:yes;status:no;location:no;menubar:no;help:no', function GotoPageAfterClose(pageid){if(pageid == 'hold') {STSNavigate(unescape(decodeURI('{SiteUrl}'))+ '/_layouts/15/hold.aspx' +'?ID={ItemId}&List={ListId}'); return false;} if(pageid == 'audit') {STSNavigate(unescape(decodeURI('{SiteUrl}'))+ '/_layouts/15/Reporting.aspx' +'?Category=Auditing&backtype=item&ID={ItemId}&List={ListId}'); return false;} if(pageid == 'config') {STSNavigate(unescape(decodeURI('{SiteUrl}'))+ '/_layouts/15/expirationconfig.aspx' +'?ID={ItemId}&List={ListId}'); return false;}}, null);

div.span: Good Evening Families of our Ogilvie Students,

br.span: Are you ready? Tomorrow is the BIG day of our first exchange of Distance Learning work packets. Timeframe: Between 8:30 and Noon. Every student’s completed packet is exchanged for the new work packet outside your home.

div.span: The delivery of student Chromebooks will be March 31st. The lease fee is being waived for students to use these in their homes until we return to school. Right now, we are assign​ing Chromebooks to the families who requested one through our Distance Learning Survey and have children in grades 5+.

div.p: Good Evening Families of our Ogilvie Students - I hope this message finds you all well - and ready to officially begin Distance Learning tomorrow - if you haven't already started!.........​

br.span: Dear Families of our Ogilvie Public Schools’ Students,

I hope this letter finds your family healthy. My heart and well wishes go out to all of you, as we experience this unsettling, unprecedented pandemic of the coronavirus, COVID-19. Governor Tim Walz has issued several Emergency Executive Orders, the most recent being issued on March 25, 2020. Order 20-19 requires all Minnesota schools to implement a Distance Learning Plan from March 30th through May 4th (March 31st through May 1st with our 4-Day School Calendar) and Order 20-20 requests we STAY at HOME from March 27th through April 10th. (Few Essential Employees will be physically at the school building.)........

div.p:
March 26th Announcement​
Good Morning Everyone,
We were very saddened by the Governor's announcement to shift school to Distance Learning through May 4th. Here is a quick update that tomorrow, our District Distance Learning plan will be distributed to families. It will be posted on our website and Facebook. Please read and note important dates, phone numbers and emails.....​

span.span: Good Evening Families of our Ogilvie Public Schools,
Today, Governor Walz extended school closure through Monday – May 4th for all schools in Minnesota.

span.em: In this emergency situation, declared by Governor Walz, we will be closing school from Wednesday, 3/18/20 through Friday 3/27/20.

p.span: On these scheduled days at home, students will be able to have enrichment and “jump start” opportunities without reporting to the school building. Students will return to school on Tuesday, 3/31/20, unless we hear otherwise from state officials. We will stay in frequent communication with you...........
“Ogilvie Public Schools is an equal opportunity provider and employer.”​

div.h3: ​​Are you having issues with your assigned device? Did you forget your username for a program? We're here to help!
